trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Santa Fe
There were no other sightings in Santa Fe on or around June 24th 2009
Summary: Bright objects on & below horizon line -- hovered then vanished w/o sound.
divs: sighting detailsi live way up in the mountains and was letting dog out. noticed an extremely bright yellow\orange light just over the mountains to the east, significantly brighter than any star or airplane, but completely silent and almost motionless. object moved straight up into the sky, very slowly and still silently, then a bit faster and then just winked out of sight. next, two smaller lights did the same thing -- but these had flashing red lights and an audible, but still very quiet, engine noise (military jets?) following the trajectory of the first object. finally, another solid light, even brighter, but white not yellow\orange, in the same relative location (east) but below the treeline, meaning hovering very, very near the ground. this light blinked twice and then also vanished. tried to photograph, but not enough light to catch detail.
